column5: I already posted these on another thread.  But I'm so friggen excited about it, I thought I would start a new one!   WE HAVE ICE!!!  Orr Lake   Little Lake - Barrie
We send some more of the cold air your way, that first ice is always exciting, hoping u have a better season than last year.
Thats the most beautiful thing I've seen in the last 2 months.
very nice...Nipissing's got a full coating of ice as of last night
This! I want more of this! This is quite the good news.

Both Orr Lake, and Little Lake has small open patches.  Looking at the weather network for Barrie.  Suposed to be around 0ish during the day all week.  -3ish at night.  Likely no ice fishing this weekend in the south.  But if this keep up, I might be eating perch on X-mass eve!
My fishing partner just sent me this pic.  Somewhere near Alcona this morning.  It's not much to look at.  But it's a start!
Midland and Penetang Bay in places, had a thin coating of ice on it today.  Tom
We have 2+ feet of ice so far.
I just returned from Fort McMurray.  2' of snow, 3' of frost in the ground, -20 during the day, -32 at night.  Right in Fort Mac guys are ice fishing & running on the ice with 4x4 trucks!!
